column4: so, i'm trying to install ubuntu on my netbook: https://help.ubuntu.com/community/Installation/FromUSBStick
but i can't get it to boot from the sd card
you have GRUB on an SD card?
that's not part of the directions, no it doesn't have grub, i assumed it was part of the image
what is on the SD card then?
last time I did this was unsuccessful but that was 5 years ago. anyway did you try to get your BIOS to boot from your sd card?
no, it just boots into windows
when i plug the drive into my mac it says it's a fat32 fs labeld ubuntu-netbook remix
no problems; better to take something that works but isn't what i was looking for than to waste mine and other people's time
what do you use now for internet?
I meant to ask which OS are you using now
mac os on my laptop, windows is on the netbook
I was gonna say try System -> Administration -> USB Startup Disk Creation
i have a vm i could try that
